text: Ara smarana karo! Amara balalama -- “e'i sahare prabesa kara, ara sekhana theke yakhana-yekhane iccha kara bharapurabhabe panahara karo, ara sadara-daraja diye natasire prabesa karo o balo'hittatuna’, yate tomadera dosatrutigulo amara tomadera jan'ya ksama kare dite pari, ara bariye dite pari subhakarmidera jan'ya.”
